pullRequest.title: Add unit test coverage for TABLESAMPLE query using filters
pullRequest.bodyText:
A bug was reported and fixed having to do with a syntax error when using TABLESAMPLE SYSTEM with a WHERE clause. This PR adds tests for that use case.
The change fixing the bug is here: 9d21dfa#diff-00858ac0881ccbdcd8368d6dbae7e14e

nodes.bodyText:
as discussed offline; please check whether WHERE clause is significant here
maybe add tests without filter to testTableSampleSystemBoundaryValues (renaming it to testTableSampleSystem)
and keep your tests with filter here (renaming to testTableSampleWithFilter)

commit.message: Add unit test coverage for TABLESAMPLE query using filters

afterCommit.message: Add unit test coverage for TABLESAMPLE query using filters
